    Source code for mfm.fitting.models.parse

    import json
from collections import defaultdict
import tempfile
from collections import OrderedDict

from PyQt4 import QtGui, QtCore, uic
from numpy import *
import sympy
from PyQt4.QtWebKit import QWebView
from PyQt4.QtCore import QFile, QFileInfo, QTextStream, QUrl
from sympy.printing.latex import latex

import mfm
from mfm.fitting.models import Model, ModelWidget, ModelCurve
from mfm.parameter import ParameterWidget, FittingParameter, AggregatedParameters


try:
    from re import Scanner
except ImportError:
    import sre
    from sre import Scanner



    [docs]class GenerateSymbols(defaultdict):
    def __missing__(self, key):
        return sympy.Symbol(key)
    



    [docs]class ParseFormula(AggregatedParameters):


    [docs]    def var_found(self, scanner, name):
        if name in ['caller','e','pi']:
            return name
        if name not in self._keys:
            self._keys.append(name)
            ret = 'a[%d]' % self._count
            self._count += 1
        else:
            ret = 'a[%d]' % (self._keys.index(name))
        return ret
    

    @property
    def initial_values(self):
        try:
            ivs = self.models[self.model_name]['initial']
        except AttributeError:
            ivs = len(self._keys) * [1.0]
        return ivs

    @property
    def models(self):
        return self._models

    @models.setter
    def models(self, v):
        self._models = v

    @property
    def model_file(self):
        return self._model_file

    @model_file.setter
    def model_file(self, v):
        self._model_file = v
        self.onLoadModelFile(v)

    @property
    def func(self):
        return self._func

    @func.setter
    def func(self, v):
        self._func = v
        scanner = Scanner([
            (r"x", lambda y,x: x),
            (r"[a-zA-Z]+\.", lambda y,x: x),
            (r"[a-z]+\(", lambda y,x: x),
            (r"[a-zA-Z_]\w*", self.var_found),
            (r"\d+\.\d*", lambda y,x: x),
            (r"\d+", lambda y,x: x),
            (r"\+|-|\*|/", lambda y,x: x),
            (r"\s+", None),
            (r"\)+", lambda y,x: x),
            (r"\(+", lambda y,x: x),
            (r",", lambda y,x: x),
            ])
        self._count = 0
        self._keys = []
        parsed, rubbish = scanner.scan(v)
        parsed = ''.join(parsed)
        if rubbish != '':
            raise Exception('parsed: %s, rubbish %s' % (parsed, rubbish))
        self.code = parsed
        self._parameters = [FittingParameter(name=n, value=1.0) for n in self._keys]


    [docs]    def onLoadModelFile(self, filename):
        with open(filename, 'r') as fp:
            self._model_file = filename
            self.models = json.load(fp, object_pairs_hook=OrderedDict)
    


    [docs]    def find_parameters(self):
        pass
    

    def __init__(self, **kwargs):
        AggregatedParameters.__init__(self, **kwargs)

        self._keys = list()
        self._model_file = None
        self._models = dict()
        self._count = 0
        self._func = "x*0"

        fn = os.path.join(mfm.package_directory, 'settings/fcs.model.json')
        self.model_file = kwargs.get('model_file', fn)
        self.model_name = kwargs.get('model_name', self.models.keys()[0])
        self.code = self._func
    



    [docs]class ParseWidget(ParseFormula, QtGui.QWidget):

    name = "Parsing"

    def __init__(self, **kwargs):
        QtGui.QWidget.__init__(self)
        uic.loadUi('mfm/ui/models/parseWidget.ui', self)
        ParseFormula.__init__(self, **kwargs)
        self.n_columns = kwargs.get('n_columns', mfm.settings['gui']['fit_models']['n_columns'])

        self.webview = QWebView()
        self.verticalLayout_4.addWidget(self.webview)

        self.connect(self.comboBox, QtCore.SIGNAL("currentIndexChanged(int)"), self.onModelChanged)
        self.connect(self.toolButton, QtCore.SIGNAL("clicked()"), self.onUpdateFunc)

    @property
    def func(self):
        text = str(self.plainTextEdit.toPlainText()).strip()
        return text

    @func.setter
    def func(self, v):
        self.plainTextEdit.setPlainText(v)
        ParseFormula.func.fset(self, v)

        layout = self.gridLayout_2
        mfm.widgets.clear_layout(layout)
        n_columns = self.n_columns
        self._parameters = list()
        # TODO use AggregatedParametersWidget add_parameter instead
        row = 1
        for i, key in enumerate(self._keys):
            column = i % n_columns
            if column == 0:
                row += 1
            try:
                v = self.initial_values[key]
            except KeyError:
                v = 1.0
            p = ParameterWidget(name=key, value=v, model=self.parent, bounds_on=False, digits=4)
            layout.addWidget(p, row, column)
            self._parameters.append(p)

        self.onPrettyEquation()
        mfm.run("cs.current_fit.update()")

    @property
    def models(self):
        return self._models

    @models.setter
    def models(self, v):
        ParseFormula.models.fset(self, v)
        self.comboBox.clear()
        self.comboBox.addItems(list(v.keys()))

    @property
    def model_name(self):
        return list(self.models.keys())[self.comboBox.currentIndex()]

    @model_name.setter
    def model_name(self, v):
        pass


    [docs]    def onPrettyEquation(self):
        s = """<html><head>
            <script type="text/javascript" src="http://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_SVG.js"></script>
            </head><body>
            <link rel="stylesheet" href="http://yui.yahooapis.com/pure/0.6.0/pure-min.css">
            <h3>%s</h3>
            <p><mathjax>
            $$
            """ % self.model_name
        try:
            f = eval(self.func, GenerateSymbols())
            s += latex(f)
        except:
            s += "Error"
        s += "$$</mathjax></p>"
        s += self.models[self.model_name]['description']
        s += "</body></html>"
        tempFile = QFile(tempfile.mktemp('.html'))
        tempFile.open(QFile.WriteOnly)
        stream = QTextStream(tempFile)
        stream << s
        tempFile.close()
        fileUrl = QUrl.fromLocalFile(QFileInfo(tempFile).canonicalFilePath())

        self.webview.load(fileUrl)
    


    [docs]    def onModelChanged(self):
        self.func = self.models[self.model_name]['equation']
    


    [docs]    def onLoadModelFile(self, filename=None):
        if filename is None:
            filename = mfm.widgets.open_file('Open model-file', 'link file (*.json)')
        ParseFormula.onLoadModelFile(self, filename)
    


    [docs]    def onUpdateFunc(self):
        mfm.run("cs.current_fit.model.parse.func = '%s'" % self.func)
        mfm.run("cs.current_fit.update()")
    



    [docs]class ParseModel(ModelCurve):

    name = "Parse-Model"

    def __init__(self, fit, **kwargs):
        ModelCurve.__init__(self, fit, **kwargs)
        self.parse = kwargs.get('parse', ParseFormula())


    [docs]    def update_model(self, **kwargs):
        a = [p.value for p in self.parse]
        x = self.fit.data.x
        try:
            y = eval(self.parse.code)
        except:
            y = zeros_like(x) + 1.0
        self._y = y
    



    [docs]class ParseModelWidget(ParseModel, ModelWidget):

    def __init__(self, fit, **kwargs):
        ModelWidget.__init__(self, fit, **kwargs)

        self.parse = ParseWidget(**kwargs)
        self.parse.onModelChanged()

        ParseModel.__init__(self, fit=fit, parse=self.parse)

        #self.fitting_widget = FittingControllerWidget(fit=fit)
        self.layout = QtGui.QVBoxLayout(self)
        self.layout.setSpacing(0)
        self.layout.setMargin(0)
        self.layout.setAlignment(QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
        #self.layout.addWidget(self.fitting_widget)

        self.layout.addWidget(self.parse)


    [docs]    def update_model(self, **kwargs):
        ParseModel.update_model(self, **kwargs)
